attributes.action: give a government gaurantee that 100% of all tax payers savings in banks and building soc. are safe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The tax payer HAS A RIGHT to this gaurantee if tax payers' money is to be used to stop banks and building societies from collapsing. If the government fails to give this gaurantee individuals will continue to extract money from these "institutions" in an effort to find safer havens for savings.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
